hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Umar said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] put on a ring of gold and put its stone toward his palm. Then the people started to wear rings of gold. Then the Messenger of Allah [SAW] threw away his ring and said: 'I will never wear it again,' and the people threw away their rings

chapter.ara-name: باب نَزْعِ الْخَاتَمِ عِنْدَ دُخُولِ الْخَلاَءِ
chapter.eng-name: Taking Off One's Ring When Entering Al-Khala' (The Area in Which One Relieves Oneself)
